sentences.en: During the competition, all the players performed very well and displayed fine sportsmanship.
sentences.cn: 在比赛中, 所有的运动员都发挥了水平,表现出了良好的体育道德.

sentences.en: Every sportsman should have sportsmanship. When defeated, he should greet his opponent and congratulate him.
sentences.cn: 每个运动员都应有运动员精神. 但被打败的时候, 运动员应该向他的对手致意并祝贺他.

sentences.en: He told Shane that they were going to learn about good sportsmanship.
sentences.cn: 他告诉夏恩他们要来学学何谓良好的运动家精神.

sentences.en: His sportsmanship and style of play is refreshing.
sentences.cn: 他的体育精神和比赛风格令人耳目一新。

sentences.en: It is a player's duty to try and transmIt'sportsmanship and moral character.
sentences.cn: 现在是球员的责任去传播体育精神和道德价值.

sentences.en: Johnson's poor sportsmanship does not sit well with the coach.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊不守运动道德,教练对此不以为然.

sentences.en: Moreover, sportsmanship as an ideal is applied to life in general.
sentences.cn: 此外, 公平和宽容的风度作为理想准则也适用于日常生活.
弘扬体育精神,促进国际往来.

sentences.en: Sports can show sportsmen's strength, speed, skill and sportsmanship.
sentences.cn: 体育运动能够显示运动员的力量 、 速度 、 技巧和体育风格.

sentences.en: Sportsmanship: - Its about his character and off the field . How sporting his conduct is.
sentences.cn: 运动精神: 这是关于球员场上场下性格的属性. (没太大用我猜)

sentences.en: Taking drugs before the Games is considered cheating and against sportsmanship.
sentences.cn: 赛前服用药物被视为作弊,且违背运动精神.

sentences.en: The athletes vow to compete to their full capacity and with sportsmanship.
sentences.cn: 运动员宣示要赛出风格,赛出水平.

sentences.en: The Olympic oath encourages athletes, coaches, and officials to observe the rules of sportsmanship.
sentences.cn: 奥运会誓言鼓励运动员 、 教练员和裁判员遵守规则,发扬体育精神.

sentences.en: The team also won praise for sportsmanship and fair play.
sentences.cn: 该队还因其良好的体育精神及公平竞争精神而受到了表扬。
这个球队的体育道德作风很好.

sentences.en: We identify sportsmanship with good character.
sentences.cn: 我们认为体育道德与良好品质是一致的.
